amendment.description: An amendment numbered 137 printed in Part A of House Report 117-420 to prevent the funds made available by this act from being made available to implement, administer or enforce section 908(b) of the Trade Sanctions Reform and Export Enhancement Act of 2000 (22 U.S.C. 7207(b)), prohibition on financing of agricultural sales to Cuba.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prevent the funds made available by this act from being made available to implement, administer or enforce section 908(b) of the Trade Sanctions Reform and Export Enhancement Act of 2000 (22 U.S.C. 7207(b)), prohibition on financing of agricultural sales to Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 260 (Roll no. 380).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 260 (Roll no. 380).
